sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Modal, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; function SettingsModal(props) { return (<> Using Grid in Modal .col-xs-12 .col-md-8 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 ) } function Settings() { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); return (<> setModalShow(false)} /> ) } export default Settings;
